item.description:
Mead is a wine made with honey in place of fruit juice. There are many variants to mead, such as melomel (a mead that supplements the honey with fruit juice), metheglin (spiced mead), cyser (a mead-cider cross), and braggot (a beer-mead cross).

The store will have a tasting, talks on the origins and lore of mead, and demonstrations of how mead is made--it's actually pretty easy! 

If anybody wants to make their own, we'll have in-store specials that day on honey, yeast, mead-related books, and more. 

If this event fills up, I'll add another later in the day.
item.name: Mead Day
